author: James Clear
quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.

author: Seneca
quote: If a person doesn’t know to which port they sail, no wind is favorable.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

author: Unknown
quote: Discipline is doing what needs to be done even when you don’t feel like it.

author: Naval Ravikant
quote: Desire is a contract you make with yourself to be unhappy until you get what you want.
